00012 bool read_jpeg(const char* filename,unsigned int width,unsigned int height,unsigned int bands, unsigned char * inputbuf);
00013 
00014 class klImageFileSource
00015 {
00016 protected:
00017     const char* _filename;
00018 
00019 private:
00020     size_t inbands;
00021     size_t inwidth ;
00022     size_t inheight;
00023     size_t bitsPerPixel;
00024 
00025     public:
00026 
00027     //Checks image file exists and looks for magic number where appropriate.
00028     //Fills in the image charateristics, width,height,bands, datatype.
00029     virtual bool queryImage()=0;
00030     
00031     void setImageParameters(unsigned int width,unsigned int height,unsigned int bands, unsigned int bpp)
00032     {
00033          inbands=width;
00034          inwidth=height;
00035          inheight=bands;
00036          bitsPerPixel=bpp;
00037     }
00038 
00039     const char* getFileName()
00040     {
00041         return _filename;
00042     }
00043 
00044     size_t getBands(void)
00045     {
00046         if(inbands==0)
00047         {
00048             queryImage();
00049         }
00050         return inbands;
00051     }
00052 
00053     size_t getWidth(void) 
00054     {
00055         if(inwidth==0)
00056         {
00057             queryImage();
00058         }
00059         return inwidth;
00060 
00061     }
00062     size_t getHeight(void)
00063     {
00064         if(inheight==0)
00065         {
00066             queryImage();
00067         }
00068         return inheight;
00069 
00070     }
00071 
00072     size_t getBitsPerPixel(void)
00073     {
00074             if(bitsPerPixel==0)
00075         {
00076             queryImage();
00077         }
00078         return bitsPerPixel;
00079     }
00080 
00081     klRasterBufferPointer render()
00082     {
00083         klRasterBufferPointer klrbp  = this->operator()();
00084         return klrbp;
00085     }   
00086     virtual klRasterBufferPointer operator()(void)=0;
00087     
00088 };
00089 
00090 class klImageFileSink
00091  {
00092  protected:
00093     const char* _filename;
00094     klRasterBufferPointer _rbp;
00095 
00096  public:
00097      klImageFileSink(const char* fileName,  klRasterBufferPointer buffer)
00098      {
00099          _filename = fileName;
00100          _rbp = buffer;
00101      }
00102      void render(void)
00103      {
00104          this->operator()();
00105      }
00106 
00107      virtual void operator()(void)=0;
00108  };
00109   
00110 class  klJPEGSourceFunctor : public klImageFileSource
00111 {
00112 
00113 public :
00114 
00115     klJPEGSourceFunctor(const char* fileName) //: klImageFileSource(fileName)
00116     {
00117         _filename = fileName;
00118     }
00119 
00120     bool queryImage()
00121     {
00122         unsigned int width=0;
00123         unsigned int height=0;
00124         unsigned int bands=0;
00125 
00126         bool ans = query_jpeg (getFileName(), width, height, bands);
00127         
00128         if(ans ==1)
00129         {
00130             setImageParameters( width, height,bands, 8);
00131         }
00132 
00133         return ans;
00134     }
00135 
00136     klRasterBufferPointer operator()(void)
00137     {       
00138         if( queryImage() )
00139         {
00140             klRasterBufferPointer dst = new klPackedHeapRasterBuffer<unsigned char>(getWidth(),getHeight(), getBands() );
00141 
00142             read_jpeg (getFileName(), getWidth(),getHeight(), getBands() , dst->buffer());
00143             return dst;
00144         }
00145         else
00146             return NULL;
00147     }
00148 
00149 };

00190             return dst;
